song.title: Singularity (Compo Mix)
song.info:
Winner of the streamed music compo @ Compusphere 2007.
I lie awake, watching the heavens Pretty soon, it might be too late Feeling victimised, burning like vengeance All this waiting is trying my faith
When all of this is over You'll still live on Through the void eternal Echoes of your song
And while stars are dying Your rain comes through To stop the fire burning When everything is new
CHORUS: I want to soar [along? alone on?] your horizon Drifting through your everlasting night Test my faith for you that I believe in For an infinite eternity in time
Frozen in time on the verge of escaping Circling indefinitely, resting in peace Matter colliding, sustaining no motion Cutting the heartbeat, all movement will cease
When all of this is over And only you remain 'Cross the distant spaces May I run once again
And while stars are dying Your rain comes through To stop the fire burning And everything is new
(repeat CHORUS x 2)
